title: Splash screen doesn't close on Windows

content.raw:
I just compiled gazebo on windows 10. gzserver seems to run, however the splash screen  for gzclient never closes. The grid doesn't appear behind it either.

The follow output from gzclient.exe --verbose:

    Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 6.1.0
    Copyright (C) 2012-2015 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
    Released under the Apache 2 License.
    http://gazebosim.org

    [Msg] Waiting for master.
    [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
    [Msg] Publicized address: 169.254.22.128
    [1;31mError [Param.hh:350][0m Unable to init parameter value from string[1.#INF]
    [1;31mError [Param.hh:350][0m Unable to init parameter value from string[1.#INF]
    [1;31mError [Param.hh:350][0m Unable to init parameter value from string[1.#INF]

gui.ini and ogre Log file attached
